class.name: BitMap
class.description: A two-dimensional array of boolean values, can be used to efficiently store a binary matrix (every matrix element takes only one bit) and query the values using natural cartesian coordinates.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a bitmap with the specified size, filled with [code]false[/code].

method.name: create_from_image_alpha
method.description: Creates a bitmap that matches the given image dimensions, every element of the bitmap is set to [code]false[/code] if the alpha value of the image at that position is equal to [code]threshold[/code] or less, and [code]true[/code] in other case.

method.name: get_bit
method.description: Returns bitmap's value at the specified position.

method.name: get_true_bit_count
method.description: Returns the amount of bitmap elements that are set to [code]true[/code].

method.name: grow_mask
method.description: Applies morphological dilation to the bitmap. The first argument is the dilation amount, Rect2 is the area where the dilation will be applied.

method.name: set_bit
method.description: Sets the bitmap's element at the specified position, to the specified value.

method.name: set_bit_rect
method.description: Sets a rectangular portion of the bitmap to the specified value.
